      family = gaussian,

      prior = c(prior(normal(0, 1), class = Intercept),

```{=tex}
\begin{align*}
ln(D)_{it} & \sim \operatorname{Normal}(\mu_{it}, \sigma) \\
\mu_{it} & \sim \alpha_{building[i], time[t]} + \beta_1 \cdot ln(P) + \beta_{2-5} \cdot X \\
\alpha_j & \sim \operatorname{Normal}(\bar\alpha, \sigma_{\alpha}) \\
\bar\alpha & \sim \operatorname{Normal}(0, 1) \\
\beta & \sim \operatorname{Normal}(0, 0.5) \\
\sigma, \sigma_{\alpha} & \sim \operatorname{Exponential}(1)
\end{align*}
```
